title: Oberto
content:
Hi everybody,   
   
Here's something I made a few years ago, all in one night, just to see if I could do it. Looks like some of the lines grew rounded caps when I converted this to a .swf, but you get the basic idea.   
   
I was thinking of trying out a sort of rounded hexagon theme for the lowercase letters, to make it more like blackletter.   
   
You can see it at [http://www.oogby.com/oberto.swf](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419215835/http:/www.oogby.com/oberto.swf)   
   
Thanks,   
   
Brian
author: oogby

comments.content: This Caps would have been great for Lang

Damn, why didn't anyone respond to this post?   
   
That is a cool looking face. I can imagine it almost as futura if it was written by monks...   
   
Love the art deco feel too.
